title: Must Watch: Brandon Semenuk is back with his own Slopestyle vision for the REALM
content:
There aren’t too many riders out there who could “reimagine slopestyle” in that way that Brandon Semenuk can. So when he and Lead Builder Justin Wyper (who can also throw down on a bike) had the chance to design and build a new slopestyle course of their own, it included four unique features that of

The post Must Watch: Brandon Semenuk is back with his own Slopestyle vision for the REALM appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
